column5: Waiting impatiently to drown some lures!!!
Blind ???????    I do not thing so, but you can definitely hurt your hand I hope you have some good cutters and first aid kit

Glad I'm not the only tackle geek around here. My "Brother P-Touch" label maker got a workout this off-season too. Sure makes life easy picking boxes for an outing. I need a muskie storage solution, those Plano 3700 boxes are too small. I will probably get a Special-Mate for my trolling spoons too leaving the SlowPoke Tackle CasketÂ© home to all the other species.
Wow Dude!  Impressive. Does your old lady know you've got that much tackle?
Know? - heck she keeps buying more!
wow!!! my missus thought I was obsessed until I showed her your boxes of tackle and how their labeled... Thanks now I am off the hook with her and her saying Im obessed lol
LOL, I just looked at that picture again, and all of those boxes ALONE, without being filled, would be my tackle budget for the summer.
Well Bookoobeast - I'm glad I could be of some help. It is a bit more anal than it appears as each of the boxes is also labelled on both sides for use of viewing.  :-)
I'm glad I don't have to help ya pack.  I ain't got half that many lures and get a headache trying to decide which ones to pack for each trip.
Never, ever, tell your Wife how much you spend on fishing gear!
The line I like is....  My worst fear is that when I die my wife will sell all my tackle for what I told her I paid for it.   Doh!

Man i got the itch badly i was cleaning the blades on my spinnerbaits and adding trailer hooks to them also and sharpening up hooks and just going through my tackle 3 days in a row, i checked out the long term forecast and Thursday we are suppose to hit a high of 15 looks like the weather is going to look nice and what perfect timing pike will be closing soon and i need to break this itch.
